items.name: Lucas Migueles
items.role: Food Operations Director at Crep Nova
items.quote:
We partnered with Tuki Studio on a design project to strengthen our brand's visual presence. We needed pieces that communicated clearly and attractively.

What I value most about Tuki Studio is their organization and communication throughout the process, always attentive to understanding what we needed and suggesting improvements.

items.name: Matias Castarataro
items.role: Professor at Federal University of Goiás
items.quote: I worked with Tuki Studio on editing a philosophy manual focused on combating fake news, designed for teenagers aged 15-18. What I valued most about working with Tuki Studio was the clarity and speed in communication during project execution. I was impressed by their creativity in concretizing vague concepts or abstract ideas, which is often a recurring challenge in creating philosophy manuals. I recommend Tuki Studio for their dedication, speed, creativity, and commitment to quality.

items.name: Cris Cózar
items.role: CEO and Marketing Consultant at El lado bueno de las marcas
items.quote: I worked with Tuki Studio on the brandbook for El lado bueno de las marcas. I already had colors, logos, and a photography style, but everything needed more visual order and coherence. What I value most about Tuki Studio is their clear process and communication. They listen, quickly understand what you need, and transform it into something better than you imagined. I loved how creatively they brought all the loose pieces together and gave them direction. Their fresh ideas, attention to detail, and strong aesthetic sense made a big difference. After working with them, I feel my brand has a solid identity. I’d recommend Tuki Studio to anyone looking to build a coherent, tasteful brand.
